issue.title: [Release] Document environment configuration to run release verification on macOS
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6753](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6753). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since I don't use macOS as a primary OS I don't have all-the-things set up for usual Arrow development. A guide for Homebrew users to be able to run the release verification starting from very little pre-installed beyond Xcode would be nice
